item.title: Setting Up a Kubernetes Cluster With Vagrant and Virtualbox
item.author: ihorse@foxmail.com (Mao Tai)
item.description: Setting up a kubernetes cluster with Vagrant and Virtualbox Using vagrant file to build a kubernetes cluster which consists of 1 master(also as node) and 3 nodes. You don’t have to create complicated ca files or configuration. See in Github: kubernetes-vagrant-centos-cluster Why don’t do that with kubeadm Because I want to setup the etcd, apiserver, controller, scheduler without docker container.
